description: The file defines a React component for the homepage of a web application, including UI layout, styles, and form handling for connecting JIRA and Confluence integrations, along with some utility functions and inline CSS.

methods.name: GlobalStyle
methods.description: Injects raw CSS into a style tag with ID to normalize styles and prevent duplication.

methods.name: safeJson
methods.description: Safely parses JSON responses, returning empty object on failure.

methods.name: SidebarItem
methods.description: Component representing a navigational sidebar item with active state styling.

methods.name: FormField
methods.description: Component for rendering labeled input fields for forms, with customizable type and placeholder.
